vastus.sokoban.logic

Class Level

  • java.lang.Object
    • vastus.sokoban.logic.Level
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ILevel

    public class Level
extends Object
implements ILevel
    Class describing a level of game. Level keeps track of all the elements.
    Author:
    Juho Hautala
